recipe.name: Baked Sweet Potatoes
recipe.cooking: Preheat oven to 400°F. Wash and pierce sweet potatoes with a fork. Rub with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Bake for 45 minutes or until tender.

recipe.name: Corn on the Cob
recipe.cooking: Boil corn for 10-15 minutes or grill for 15 minutes. Brush with butter and season with salt and pepper.

recipe.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipe.cooking: Stir fry vegetables in oil over medium heat. Add garlic and ginger, then soy sauce. Stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until vegetables are tender.

recipe.name: Sweet and Sour Chicken
recipe.cooking: Cook chicken in a skillet until browned. Add vegetables, pineapple, soy sauce, sugar, and vinegar. Simmer for 10 minutes.

recipe.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipe.cooking: Grill or pan-sear chicken. Toss lettuce with dressing, cheese, croutons, and sliced chicken.

recipe.name: Beef Tacos
recipe.cooking: Brown beef in a skillet. Add taco seasoning and water, simmer. Serve in taco shells with toppings.

recipe.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipe.cooking: Cook spaghetti. Fry bacon and garlic in a pan. Mix cooked spaghetti with bacon, beaten eggs, and cheese. Toss with black pepper.

recipe.name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
recipe.cooking: Cook quinoa and chickpeas. Arrange on a bowl with veggies and drizzle with tahini dressing.

recipe.name: Pancakes
recipe.cooking: Mix ingredients into a batter. Pour onto a hot griddle and cook until golden brown on both sides.

recipe.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipe.cooking: Mix all ingredients and form dough into balls. Bake at 350°F for 10-12 minutes.

recipe.name: Beef Stroganoff
recipe.cooking: Brown beef, cook onions and mushrooms in a skillet. Add garlic, beef broth, and sour cream. Serve over egg noodles.

recipe.name: Margarita Pizza
recipe.cooking: Spread tomato sauce on dough, top with cheese and basil. Bake at 475°F for 10-12 minutes.

recipe.name: Lemon Chicken Piccata
recipe.cooking: Cook chicken breasts in butter. Remove, add lemon juice, capers, and wine to the pan to make sauce. Serve chicken with sauce.

recipe.name: Vegetable Soup
recipe.cooking: Combine all ingredients in a pot and simmer for 30 minutes until vegetables are tender.

recipe.name: Shrimp Scampi
recipe.cooking: Cook shrimp in butter and garlic. Toss with cooked spaghetti and lemon juice. Garnish with parsley.

recipe.name: Chicken Alfredo
recipe.cooking: Cook chicken. In a separate pan, melt butter, add garlic, cream, and cheese. Toss with fettucine.

recipe.name: Fish Tacos
recipe.cooking: Cook fish and serve in taco shells with cabbage, sour cream, cilantro, and a squeeze of lime.

recipe.name: Falafel
recipe.cooking: Blend ingredients into a dough, form into balls, and fry until golden brown.

recipe.name: Eggplant Parmesan
recipe.cooking: Bread and fry eggplant slices. Layer with tomato sauce and cheese, then bake until golden.

recipe.name: Lasagna
recipe.cooking: Layer cooked noodles with meat sauce and cheese. Bake at 375°F for 45 minutes.

recipe.name: Moussaka
recipe.cooking: Layer fried eggplant with meat sauce and béchamel. Bake at 350°F for 45 minutes.

recipe.name: Baked Salmon
recipe.cooking: Season salmon with garlic, lemon, and olive oil. Bake at 375°F for 15-20 minutes.

recipe.name: Beef Wellington
recipe.cooking: Sear beef, wrap in prosciutto and mushrooms, then puff pastry. Bake at 400°F for 45 minutes.

recipe.name: Chicken Parmesan
recipe.cooking: Bread and fry chicken, then top with sauce and cheese. Bake until bubbly.

recipe.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipe.cooking: Butter bread and grill with cheese until golden brown.

recipe.name: Ratatouille
recipe.cooking: Cook vegetables with olive oil, garlic, and herbs until tender.

recipe.name: Chicken Shawarma
recipe.cooking: Marinate chicken, then grill or roast. Serve with pita and tahini.

recipe.name: Pad Thai
recipe.cooking: Stir fry noodles with shrimp, tofu, and eggs. Toss with fish sauce, peanuts, and lime.

recipe.name: Beef Bulgogi
recipe.cooking: Marinate beef in soy sauce and seasonings, then stir fry with vegetables.
